content:
Reviewed by Martin Dvořák, who is active in computability.

link
(This is now ready for review after a second review by Martin.)

#21585

We may not have suitable reviewers available at Mathlib. I think this sort of material is an excellent candidate for an official "child of Mathlib" repository (i.e. same standards as mathlib, leanprover-community organization, independent maintainer team, still oversight by the Mathlib admin team). I'd love to see the people working on computability hash this out!
